String.string:
Speak with Mystel.
(Use the Unknown Device at {@Rgn:4013$$Edge of the Mountain} if you leave the quest area.)

Defeat Khemadia.
(Use the Unknown Device at {@Rgn:4013$$Edge of the Mountain} if you leave the quest area.)

Use Mystel's Aura and return to the Veil.
(Use the Unknown Device at {@Rgn:4013$$Edge of the Mountain} if you leave the quest area.)
There you are, you pathetic insect!

Defeat Khemadia.
(Use the Unknown Device at {@Rgn:4013$$Edge of the Mountain} if you leave the quest area.)

Speak with Mystel.
(Use the Unknown Device at {@Rgn:4013$$Edge of the Mountain} if you leave the quest area.)
